title: Growth in Private Credit, The Launch of Disney+, What’s Next for the Fed
itunes:title: Growth in Private Credit, The Launch of Disney+, What’s Next for the Fed
description:
Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Bloomberg Opinion Columnist Adam Minter discuss Star Wipers creating riches from rags. Michael Ewald, Head of Private Credit at Bain Capital, talks seeing continued growth in the private credit space. Jeff Greenfield, Chief Attribution Officer at C3 Metrics, and Bloomberg Intelligence Media Analyst Geetha Ranganathan walk through the launch of Disney+. Bloomberg News Federal Reserve Reporter Chris Condon breaks down the likelihood of the Fed keeping rates steady through the election cycle. And we Drive to the Close with JJ Kinahan, Chief Market Strategist at TD Ameritrade.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway.


See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
